title: Introduction to the Migration Toolkit for Applications
subtitle: Learn how to use the {ProductName} to migrate and manage applications when migrating them to OpenShift Container Platform.

abstract.para: This guide provides information to help you get started with the {ProductName} so you can accelerate large-scale application modernization efforts across hybrid cloud environments on Red Hat OpenShift. This solution provides insight throughout the adoption process, at both the portfolio and application levels: inventory, assess, analyze, and manage applications for faster migration to OpenShift via the user interface..
